10 Jebina Street  
                                                                                                                                               Bariga  Lagos , Nigeria.  
                                                                                                                                               22nd July, 2 024.                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                 
Revent Technologies   
16, Kafayat Abdulrazaq, Lekki  
Phase 1, Lagos, Nigeria.  
 
Dear Hiring Manager  
I am writing to express my enthusiasm for the Data Scientist position at Revent Technologies, as 
advertised on Jobita . With a strong background in data science and a passion for leveraging technology 
to solve modern challenges, I am excited about the opportunity to contribute to your innovative team.  
I have developed a solid foundation in machine learning, data analysis, and statistical modeli ng.  I have 
also honed my skills in Python  and SQL, which I believe are crucial for delivering insightful data -driven 
solutions.  
What particularly excites me about Revent Technologies is your commitment to staying at the forefront 
of emerging trends and your holistic approach to technology solutions. Whether it's developing AI -driven 
applications or pioneering IoT initiatives, the c ollaborative and innovative environment at Revent 
Technologies is exactly where I see myself thriving and contributing significantly.  
I am eager to bring my analytical skills, technical expertise, and enthusiasm for innovation to your team. 
Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my 
background and skills can be an asset to Revent Technol ogies.  
 
Yours Sincerely,   
Ibekwe Kingsley
